channel.title: Founding Fathers on The Yankee
channel.description: Recent content in Founding Fathers on The Yankee

item.title: The Founding Fathers - The Revolutionary Rejects - What Made Them So Incredible?
item.description: A hot summerâ€™s day, in early July, a group of criminals began the process that would be remembered from then until the day of the last man. These criminals, united by nothing but their valor and determination to create a strong foundation, began the process, known as the American Revolution. These criminals were not traditional criminals, more renaissance criminals: men who were not led astray by the common, traditional beliefs which fellow men tended to cling to, only adopting practices which would change their lives for the better.
